subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After qualifying was rained out three straight weeks, with Nascar lining up the cars by points, Jeff Gordon won the pole for Sunday’s Dickies 500 on the one-and-a-half-mile Texas Motor Speedway oval in Fort Worth.
snippet: After qualifying was rained out three straight weeks, with Nascar lining up the cars by points, Jeff Gordon won the pole for Sunday’s Dickies 500 on the one-and-a-half-mile Texas Motor Speedway oval in Fort Worth.
